channel.title: CVE Feed for Poppler -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Poppler -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2818|2024-09-17T04:29:31.861Z -- poppler -- poppler
item.description: An exploitable heap overflow vulnerability exists in the image rendering functionality of Poppler 0.53.0. A specifically crafted PDF can cause an overly large number of color components during image rendering, resulting in heap corruption. An attacker controlled PDF file can be used to trigger this vulnerability.
